short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your comics on Marvel Unlimited

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps track of the comics you read on Marvel Unlimited. Adds a "read/unread" button to each issue. All data is stored locally and is not accessible from other computers.
